annotations.description: The Pan Daisy was created by New York Bartender Cory Fitzsimmons. This drink is a modern reimagination of a Daisy Cocktail and what i like so much about it i...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Pan Daisy

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gin
.25oz (7.5ml) Akvavit
.25oz (7.5ml) Cointreau
.75oz (22.5ml) Grapefruit Juice
.5oz (15ml) Cinnamon Syrup

Shake and pour over ice into rocks glass. 
Fresh Grated Nutmeg
Orange Peel Garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxY2n6_UTBM
title: Pan Daisy
